nodes.text: A male Sanyassan with an eye patch over his right eye was a member of the Sanyassan Marauders of Endor in 3 ABY. The Sanyassan was on guard duty on a curtain wall of Terak's Keep when Noa Briqualon, Wicket Wystri Warrick, and Teek stormed the castle to rescue the captive Human girl Cindel Towani. When the Sanyassan noticed Briqualon climbing a rope and scaling the side of the castle, he prepared to fire his blaster—little did he know that Warrick had tied the other end of the rope around his ankle. A shove from Warrick sent the Sanyassan tumbling over the side of the curtain wall and into the moat below while simultaneously propelling Briqualon to the top.
